nodes.text: Perpetuus was an 80 meter-long CSS-1 Corellian Star Shuttle which brought the newly-elected Supreme Chancellor Palpatine to Naboo following the end of the Trade Federation invasion in 32 BBY.

Daniel Wallace was going to include the name of the Perpetuus in his The Essential Guide to Episode I, but the project was canceled and the name was never used elsewhere until the 2012 reference book Star Wars: The Phantom Menace: The Expanded Visual Dictionary included the name next to an image of the vessel.
